name: Incarnation (itch)
description:
Welcome to Incarnation!

Incarnation is a free jrpg style game created in RPG Maker MV for a game jam. Players control a main character, Tara, as she tries to fight her way out of a dungeon that she has woken up in. In each incarnation (up to three times), Tara and her companions can learn more skills to grow powerful enough to fight their way past the guardian and to the world outside.

There is another path out, but only if you can play nice enough with your companions to be the willing to take your place.
